s: Summary: The Cardano Happy Hour offers developers, founders and ecosystem leaders a relaxed networking environment on a rooftop venue.
Topics: Cardano smart contracts, dApp development, governance mechanisms, staking economics, community growth.
Speakers: Cardano foundation leads, Rare Network team, project founders.
r: Deepen technical understanding of Cardano’s Plutus ecosystem.
Identify partnership opportunities with emerging dApp teams.
Engage directly with governance stakeholders shaping protocol upgrades.
